Sentencas: Materials with graded composition can be obtained by a sedimentation process during which particles of a powder mixture within a suspension fall by gravity upon a substrate.
Titulo: A sedimentation process for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes with graded composition

Sentencas: This process has been used to fabricate bulk SOFC cathodes by sedimentation of lanthanum strontium manganate (LSM) and yttria stabilised zirconia (YSZ) powder mixture upon a dense YSZ substrate and subsequent firing.
Titulo: A sedimentation process for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes with graded composition

Sentencas: A numerical simulation of sedimentation based on Stokes' law has been developed to control material and process parameters.
Titulo: A sedimentation process for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes with graded composition

Sentencas: Two cathodes with different composition gradients have been obtained by changing the initial conditions of the sedimentation.
Titulo: A sedimentation process for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes with graded composition

Sentencas: Their compositions estimated by electron dispersive spectrometry (EDS) have been found to be in reasonably good agreement with the prediction of the numerical model.
Titulo: A sedimentation process for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes with graded composition
A sedimentation process for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cell cathodes with graded composition
